1.text: Hey there, I am Cute Dog 🐶! Do you wanna talk to me?

3.text: OH! 😞 Come on! I am lonely... talk to meeeee!

7.text: I realy don't have a name... everybody calls me Cute Dog I guess...
keyboard: That's cute 😍 I mean you're cute :D
I think you need a name!

8.text: Oh well... I am sry to tell you this but you suck at joking :)) kidding :D
keyboard: I know... 😔 tell me your name

9.text: I know :> Do you wanna see me naked?

10.text: I think I am OK with the Cute Dog thing! Do you wanna see me naked?

12.text: Because I am a dog... I am always naked!

13.text: Now it's your turn... if you are naked :>
keyboard: I am not you sick dog 😡
I am 👙... but I won't do it 😳

14.text: Joking :D worth a shot by the way...
